message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV 

The paper discusses a methodology for automatically obtaining a representation for text mining tasks, which involves machine learning and natural language processing techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Additionally, the paper also involves aspects of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and computer vision (cs.CV) since it deals with the analysis of textual data.
